items.sentence: Why don\'t you do us a favor and just leave?
Why don\'t you go out and get some firewood?
Why don\'t you guys go get ready for school?
You have a habit of exaggerating everything.
Tom thinks Mary may have an eating disorder.
Tom walked to the window and looked outside.
Tom wants Mary to make spaghetti for dinner.
I think that you\'ll not be able to do that.
Tom\'s office is larger than Mary\'s office.
They got blamed, but it wasn\'t their fault.
They must\'ve found out about what happened.
They\'re on good terms with their neighbors.
It\'s a beautiful day for a hike, isn\'t it?
I don\'t understand what\'s happening to me.
I don\'t understand what\'s happening to us.
I don\'t understand why this isn\'t working.
Have you learned nothing from your mistakes?
He sleeps during the day and works at night.
How many days do you want to stay in Boston?
I told Tom that you would come to Australia.
